detail_desc: Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Short, elasticated sleeves, flounces at the front, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Short dress in crinkled, patterned jersey with a round neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with tie-top shoulder straps, a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a scalloped lace trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Lightweight coat in twill made from a viscose blend with lapels and long sleeves with a decorative tab at the cuffs. Pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and fastening with covered buttons at one side. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam and flounce at the hem.
Blouse in a softly draping, patterned weave with frills, a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Seam with a gently flared peplum and long sleeves with smocking and frills at the cuffs.
Blouse in a softly draping, patterned weave with frills, a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Seam with a gently flared peplum and long sleeves with smocking and frills at the cuffs.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Rectangular shoulder bag in a sturdy weave with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable nylon shoulder strap. Lined. Size 4x12x17 cm.
Linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket denim jeans with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Fitted body in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Gently tailored jacket in a stretch dobby weave with narrow notch lapels, one button at the front, patch pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front, a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt. Lined at the top.
Running shorts in fast-drying, stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ventilating mesh sections at the top and crotch. Mesh inner shorts.
Running shorts in fast-drying, stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ventilating mesh sections at the top and crotch. Mesh inner shorts.
Running shorts in fast-drying, stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ventilating mesh sections at the top and crotch. Mesh inner shorts.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, side pockets and broderie anglaise at the hems.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, side pockets and broderie anglaise at the hems.
Calf-length dress in embroidered, sequined mesh with and opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Sewn-in satin underdress.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a gathered seam and detachable, satin tie belt at the waist. Zip at the back and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a gathered seam and detachable, satin tie belt at the waist. Zip at the back and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Sunglasses with glittery plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Baby Exclusive. Pull-on trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. Short lace sleeves with a flounce, an elasticated seam and sewn-in fabric tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. Short lace sleeves with a flounce, an elasticated seam and sewn-in fabric tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Dress with a lace bodice and chiffon skirt. Round neckline, short cap sleeves, a zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Dress with a lace bodice and chiffon skirt. Round neckline, short cap sleeves, a zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Trousers in a softly draping weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Lace body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and fastening at the crotch.
Long-sleeved body in mesh with a turtle neck, lined front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved body in mesh with a turtle neck, lined front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Top in stretch velour with a sparkly stone-embroidered pattern, wide neckline and long sleeves.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe and lace with a round neckline and cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back, and a gently flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe and lace with a round neckline and cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back, and a gently flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a high waist, buttons at the top and a laser-cut, scalloped hem. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.

Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, buttons down the front and embroidery at the front.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a concealed silicone trim and short sleeves. Overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.

Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, side pockets, a fake fly and straight, wide legs.
Bomber jacket in a patterned weave with a sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Slip-on shoes in imitation suede with a perforated pattern on the uppers, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slip-on shoes in imitation suede with a perforated pattern on the uppers, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Large, heart-shaped earrings in metal with plastic beads. Length 7 cm.

Short coat in a soft Italian wool blend containing some mohair. Concealed press-studs down the front, gently dropped shoulders and pockets in the side seams. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille with elasticated tops.
Leather court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.
